author: Dr. Céline  Gounder
title: Whooping cough cases surge amid falling vaccination rates, waning immunity - CBS News
description: New details from health officials suggest the whooping cough surge may be part of a national pattern driven by slipping vaccine coverage and waning immunity, with infants bearing the brunt.
content:
Rates of pertussis, also known as whooping cough, are surging in Texas, Florida, California, Oregon, and other states and localities across the country.
The outbreaks are fueled by falling vaccinati… [+7406 chars]
